metadata.name: Query2PruebaUnderwritingBusquedaPor
metadata.UserInput: CLIENT.SCLIENT,Client ID/Código de Cliente,Char,Cliente|UNDERWRITINGCASE.UNDERWRITINGCASEID,Underwriting Case ID/Caso,Numeric,NroSimulacion|UNDERWRITINGCASE.OPENDATE,Open Date/Fecha de Apertura,DateTime,RecordEffectiveDate

QueryStatements.RetrieveAll: SELECT CLIENT.ROWID AS RECORDID, CLIENT.SCLIENT, CLIENT.SCLIENT, CLIENT.SCLIENT, CLIENT.SFIRSTNAME, CLIENT.SLASTNAME FROM CLIENT WHERE CLIENT.SCLIENT = '[CLIENTE]' ORDER BY CLIENT.SCLIENT
QueryStatements.RetrieveByKey: SELECT CLIENT.ROWID AS RECORDID, CLIENT.SCLIENT, CLIENT.SCLIENT, CLIENT.SCLIENT, CLIENT.SFIRSTNAME, CLIENT.SLASTNAME FROM CLIENT WHERE CLIENT.SCLIENT = '{SCLIENT}'
QueryStatements.IsExist: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLIENT WHERE CLIENT.SCLIENT = '[CLIENTE]'

ToolTip.Value: First name and middle name of the client.

QueryStatements.RetrieveAll: SELECT DISTINCT ROLES.ROWID AS RECORDID, ROLES.SCERTYPE,ROLES.NBRANCH,ROLES.NPRODUCT,ROLES.NPOLICY,ROLES.NCERTIF,ROLES.NROLE,ROLES.SCLIENT,ROLES.DEFFECDATE, ROLES.SCERTYPE, ROLES.DEFFECDATE, ROLES.NBRANCH, ROLES.NPRODUCT, ROLES.NPOLICY, ROLES.NCERTIF, CERTIFICAT1.DNULLDATE AS CERTIFICATDNULLDATE, CERTIFICAT1.DSTARTDATE AS CERTIFICATDSTARTDATE, TABLE132.SDESCRIPT AS CERTIFICATNNULLCODEDESC, TABLE1813.SDESCRIPT AS CERTIFICATSSTATUSVADESC FROM ROLES LEFT JOIN CERTIFICAT CERTIFICAT1 ON CERTIFICAT1.SCERTYPE = ROLES.SCERTYPE AND CERTIFICAT1.NBRANCH = ROLES.NBRANCH AND CERTIFICAT1.NPRODUCT = ROLES.NPRODUCT AND CERTIFICAT1.NPOLICY = ROLES.NPOLICY AND CERTIFICAT1.NCERTIF = ROLES.NCERTIF LEFT JOIN TABLE13 TABLE132 ON TABLE132.NNULLCODE = CERTIFICAT1.NNULLCODE LEFT JOIN TABLE181 TABLE1813 ON TABLE1813.SSTATUSVA = CERTIFICAT1.SSTATUSVA WHERE CERTIFICAT1.SCERTYPE = '2' AND CERTIFICAT1.SSTATUSVA <> '3' AND ROLES.SCLIENT = '{SCLIENT}' AND ROLES.DEFFECDATE <= '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]' AND (ROLES.DNULLDATE IS NULL OR ROLES.DNULLDATE > '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]') ORDER BY ROLES.SCERTYPE, ROLES.NBRANCH, ROLES.NPRODUCT, ROLES.NPOLICY, ROLES.NCERTIF, ROLES.NROLE, ROLES.SCLIENT, ROLES.DEFFECDATE
QueryStatements.RetrieveByKey: SELECT DISTINCT ROLES.ROWID AS RECORDID, ROLES.SCERTYPE,ROLES.NBRANCH,ROLES.NPRODUCT,ROLES.NPOLICY,ROLES.NCERTIF,ROLES.NROLE,ROLES.SCLIENT,ROLES.DEFFECDATE, ROLES.SCERTYPE, ROLES.DEFFECDATE, ROLES.NBRANCH, ROLES.NPRODUCT, ROLES.NPOLICY, ROLES.NCERTIF, CERTIFICAT1.DNULLDATE AS CERTIFICATDNULLDATE, CERTIFICAT1.DSTARTDATE AS CERTIFICATDSTARTDATE, TABLE132.SDESCRIPT AS CERTIFICATNNULLCODEDESC, TABLE1813.SDESCRIPT AS CERTIFICATSSTATUSVADESC FROM ROLES LEFT JOIN CERTIFICAT CERTIFICAT1 ON CERTIFICAT1.SCERTYPE = ROLES.SCERTYPE AND CERTIFICAT1.NBRANCH = ROLES.NBRANCH AND CERTIFICAT1.NPRODUCT = ROLES.NPRODUCT AND CERTIFICAT1.NPOLICY = ROLES.NPOLICY AND CERTIFICAT1.NCERTIF = ROLES.NCERTIF LEFT JOIN TABLE13 TABLE132 ON TABLE132.NNULLCODE = CERTIFICAT1.NNULLCODE LEFT JOIN TABLE181 TABLE1813 ON TABLE1813.SSTATUSVA = CERTIFICAT1.SSTATUSVA WHERE ROLES.SCERTYPE = '{SCERTYPE}' AND ROLES.NBRANCH = {NBRANCH} AND ROLES.NPRODUCT = {NPRODUCT} AND ROLES.NPOLICY = {NPOLICY} AND ROLES.NCERTIF = {NCERTIF} AND ROLES.NROLE = {NROLE} AND ROLES.SCLIENT = '{SCLIENT}' AND ROLES.DEFFECDATE = '{DEFFECDATE:D}' AND ROLES.DEFFECDATE <= '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]' AND (ROLES.DNULLDATE IS NULL OR ROLES.DNULLDATE > '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]')
QueryStatements.IsExist: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) FROM ROLES LEFT JOIN CERTIFICAT CERTIFICAT1 ON CERTIFICAT1.SCERTYPE = ROLES.SCERTYPE AND CERTIFICAT1.NBRANCH = ROLES.NBRANCH AND CERTIFICAT1.NPRODUCT = ROLES.NPRODUCT AND CERTIFICAT1.NPOLICY = ROLES.NPOLICY AND CERTIFICAT1.NCERTIF = ROLES.NCERTIF WHERE CERTIFICAT1.SCERTYPE = '2' AND CERTIFICAT1.SSTATUSVA <> '3' AND ROLES.SCLIENT = '{SCLIENT}' AND ROLES.DEFFECDATE <= '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]' AND (ROLES.DNULLDATE IS NULL OR ROLES.DNULLDATE > '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]')

ToolTip.Value: Code of the line of business.
Código de anulación de la póliza/certificado.
Date when the record is cancelled.
Fecha de efecto (inicio de vigencia) de la póliza o certificado.

Remark.Value: Role of the client in the policy/certificate.
Clientes de una póliza o certificado.

QueryStatements.RetrieveAll: SELECT DISTINCT ROLES.ROWID AS RECORDID, ROLES.SCERTYPE,ROLES.NBRANCH,ROLES.NPRODUCT,ROLES.NPOLICY,ROLES.NCERTIF,ROLES.NROLE,ROLES.SCLIENT,ROLES.DEFFECDATE, ROLES.SCERTYPE, ROLES.DEFFECDATE, ROLES.SCERTYPE, ROLES.NBRANCH, ROLES.NPRODUCT, ROLES.NPOLICY, ROLES.NCERTIF, ROLES.NROLE, TABLE121.SDESCRIPT AS NROLEDESC, CERTIFICAT2.NCAPITAL AS CERTIFICATNCAPITAL, CERTIFICAT2.DCOMPDATE AS CERTIFICATDCOMPDATE FROM ROLES LEFT JOIN CERTIFICAT CERTIFICAT2 ON CERTIFICAT2.SCERTYPE = ROLES.SCERTYPE AND CERTIFICAT2.NBRANCH = ROLES.NBRANCH AND CERTIFICAT2.NPRODUCT = ROLES.NPRODUCT AND CERTIFICAT2.NPOLICY = ROLES.NPOLICY AND CERTIFICAT2.NCERTIF = ROLES.NCERTIF LEFT JOIN TABLE12 TABLE121 ON TABLE121.NROLE = ROLES.NROLE WHERE CERTIFICAT2.SCERTYPE = '3' AND ROLES.SCLIENT = '{SCLIENT}' AND ROLES.DEFFECDATE <= '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]' AND (ROLES.DNULLDATE IS NULL OR ROLES.DNULLDATE > '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]') ORDER BY ROLES.SCERTYPE, ROLES.NBRANCH, ROLES.NPRODUCT, ROLES.NPOLICY, ROLES.NCERTIF, ROLES.NROLE, ROLES.SCLIENT, ROLES.DEFFECDATE
QueryStatements.RetrieveByKey: SELECT DISTINCT ROLES.ROWID AS RECORDID, ROLES.SCERTYPE,ROLES.NBRANCH,ROLES.NPRODUCT,ROLES.NPOLICY,ROLES.NCERTIF,ROLES.NROLE,ROLES.SCLIENT,ROLES.DEFFECDATE, ROLES.SCERTYPE, ROLES.DEFFECDATE, ROLES.SCERTYPE, ROLES.NBRANCH, ROLES.NPRODUCT, ROLES.NPOLICY, ROLES.NCERTIF, ROLES.NROLE, TABLE121.SDESCRIPT AS NROLEDESC, CERTIFICAT2.NCAPITAL AS CERTIFICATNCAPITAL, CERTIFICAT2.DCOMPDATE AS CERTIFICATDCOMPDATE FROM ROLES LEFT JOIN CERTIFICAT CERTIFICAT2 ON CERTIFICAT2.SCERTYPE = ROLES.SCERTYPE AND CERTIFICAT2.NBRANCH = ROLES.NBRANCH AND CERTIFICAT2.NPRODUCT = ROLES.NPRODUCT AND CERTIFICAT2.NPOLICY = ROLES.NPOLICY AND CERTIFICAT2.NCERTIF = ROLES.NCERTIF LEFT JOIN TABLE12 TABLE121 ON TABLE121.NROLE = ROLES.NROLE WHERE ROLES.SCERTYPE = '{SCERTYPE}' AND ROLES.NBRANCH = {NBRANCH} AND ROLES.NPRODUCT = {NPRODUCT} AND ROLES.NPOLICY = {NPOLICY} AND ROLES.NCERTIF = {NCERTIF} AND ROLES.NROLE = {NROLE} AND ROLES.SCLIENT = '{SCLIENT}' AND ROLES.DEFFECDATE = '{DEFFECDATE:D}' AND ROLES.DEFFECDATE <= '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]' AND (ROLES.DNULLDATE IS NULL OR ROLES.DNULLDATE > '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]')
QueryStatements.IsExist: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) FROM ROLES LEFT JOIN CERTIFICAT CERTIFICAT1 ON CERTIFICAT1.SCERTYPE = ROLES.SCERTYPE AND CERTIFICAT1.NBRANCH = ROLES.NBRANCH AND CERTIFICAT1.NPRODUCT = ROLES.NPRODUCT AND CERTIFICAT1.NPOLICY = ROLES.NPOLICY AND CERTIFICAT1.NCERTIF = ROLES.NCERTIF WHERE CERTIFICAT1.SCERTYPE = '3' AND ROLES.SCLIENT = '{SCLIENT}' AND ROLES.DEFFECDATE <= '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]' AND (ROLES.DNULLDATE IS NULL OR ROLES.DNULLDATE > '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]')

ToolTip.Value: Code of the line of business.
Role of the client in the policy.
Figura con la que actúa el cliente en la póliza.
Monto de capital asegurado de la póliza/certificado.
Computer date when the record is updated or created.
Fecha del computador en que se crea o actualiza el registro.

Remark.Value: Role of the client in the policy/certificate.
Clientes de una póliza o certificado.

QueryStatements.RetrieveAll: SELECT DISTINCT ROLEINCASE.ROWID AS RECORDID, ROLEINCASE.UNDERWRITINGCASEID,ROLEINCASE.ROLE,ROLEINCASE.CLIENTID, ROLEINCASE.UNDERWRITINGCASEID, ROLEINCASE.CLIENTID, UNDERWRITINGCASE1.UNDERWRITINGCASEID AS UNDERWRITINGCASEUNDERWRIT, UNDERWRITINGCASE1.OPENDATE AS UNDERWRITINGCASEOPENDATE, UNDERWRITINGCASE1.PRODUCT AS UNDERWRITINGCASEPRODUCT, UNDERWRITINGCASE1.POLICYID AS UNDERWRITINGCASEPOLICYID, UNDERWRITINGCASE1.CERTIFICATEID AS UNDERWRITINGCASECERTIFICA, TRANSUNDERWRITINGCASESTYPE2.DESCRIPTION AS UNDERWRITINGCASESTATUSDES FROM ROLEINCASE LEFT JOIN UNDERWRITINGCASE UNDERWRITINGCASE1 ON UNDERWRITINGCASE1.UNDERWRITINGCASEID = ROLEINCASE.UNDERWRITINGCASEID LEFT JOIN TRANSUNDERWRITINGCASESTYPE TRANSUNDERWRITINGCASESTYPE2 ON TRANSUNDERWRITINGCASESTYPE2.UNDERWRITINGCASESTATUS = UNDERWRITINGCASE1.STATUS AND TRANSUNDERWRITINGCASESTYPE2.LANGUAGEID = #LANGUAGEID# WHERE (ROLEINCASE.ROLE = 2 AND UNDERWRITINGCASE1.UNDERWRITINGCASEID = [NROSIMULACION] AND [BUSQUEDAPOR] = 2) OR (ROLEINCASE.ROLE = 2 AND [BUSQUEDAPOR] = 3 AND UNDERWRITINGCASE1.OPENDATE >= '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]' AND UNDERWRITINGCASE1.OPENDATE <= '[FECHAHASTA]') AND ROLEINCASE.CLIENTID = '{SCLIENT}' ORDER BY ROLEINCASE.UNDERWRITINGCASEID, ROLEINCASE.ROLE, ROLEINCASE.CLIENTID
QueryStatements.RetrieveByKey: SELECT DISTINCT ROLEINCASE.ROWID AS RECORDID, ROLEINCASE.UNDERWRITINGCASEID,ROLEINCASE.ROLE,ROLEINCASE.CLIENTID, ROLEINCASE.UNDERWRITINGCASEID, ROLEINCASE.CLIENTID, UNDERWRITINGCASE1.UNDERWRITINGCASEID AS UNDERWRITINGCASEUNDERWRIT, UNDERWRITINGCASE1.OPENDATE AS UNDERWRITINGCASEOPENDATE, UNDERWRITINGCASE1.PRODUCT AS UNDERWRITINGCASEPRODUCT, UNDERWRITINGCASE1.POLICYID AS UNDERWRITINGCASEPOLICYID, UNDERWRITINGCASE1.CERTIFICATEID AS UNDERWRITINGCASECERTIFICA, TRANSUNDERWRITINGCASESTYPE2.DESCRIPTION AS UNDERWRITINGCASESTATUSDES FROM ROLEINCASE LEFT JOIN UNDERWRITINGCASE UNDERWRITINGCASE1 ON UNDERWRITINGCASE1.UNDERWRITINGCASEID = ROLEINCASE.UNDERWRITINGCASEID LEFT JOIN TRANSUNDERWRITINGCASESTYPE TRANSUNDERWRITINGCASESTYPE2 ON TRANSUNDERWRITINGCASESTYPE2.UNDERWRITINGCASESTATUS = UNDERWRITINGCASE1.STATUS AND TRANSUNDERWRITINGCASESTYPE2.LANGUAGEID = #LANGUAGEID# WHERE ROLEINCASE.UNDERWRITINGCASEID = {UNDERWRITINGCASEID} AND ROLEINCASE.ROLE = {ROLE} AND ROLEINCASE.CLIENTID = '{CLIENTID}' AND ROLEINCASE.CLIENTID = '{SCLIENT}'
QueryStatements.IsExist: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) FROM ROLEINCASE LEFT JOIN UNDERWRITINGCASE UNDERWRITINGCASE1 ON UNDERWRITINGCASE1.UNDERWRITINGCASEID = ROLEINCASE.UNDERWRITINGCASEID WHERE (ROLEINCASE.ROLE = 2 AND UNDERWRITINGCASE1.UNDERWRITINGCASEID = [NROSIMULACION] AND [BUSQUEDAPOR] = 2) OR (ROLEINCASE.ROLE = 2 AND [BUSQUEDAPOR] = 3 AND UNDERWRITINGCASE1.OPENDATE >= '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]' AND UNDERWRITINGCASE1.OPENDATE <= '[FECHAHASTA]') AND ROLEINCASE.CLIENTID = '{SCLIENT}'

ToolTip.Value: Date the subscription case was created.
Fecha en que fue creado el caso de suscripción.
Número que identifica la Política / Presupuesto / Aplicación.

Remark.Value: Persons or companies related to underwriting case.
Personas o empresas relacionadas con este caso.

QueryStatements.RetrieveAll: SELECT DISTINCT ROLEINCASE.ROWID AS RECORDID, ROLEINCASE.UNDERWRITINGCASEID,ROLEINCASE.ROLE,ROLEINCASE.CLIENTID, ROLEINCASE.UNDERWRITINGCASEID, ROLEINCASE.CLIENTID, UNDERWRITINGCASE1.UNDERWRITINGCASEID AS UNDERWRITINGCASEUNDERWRIT, UNDERWRITINGCASE1.OPENDATE AS UNDERWRITINGCASEOPENDATE, UNDERWRITINGCASE1.CLOSEDATE AS UNDERWRITINGCASECLOSEDATE, TRANSUNDERWRITINGCASESTYPE2.DESCRIPTION AS UNDERWRITINGCASESTATUSDES, TRANSDECISIONTYPE3.DESCRIPTION AS UNDERWRITINGCASEDECISIOND, TRANSRISKCLASSTYPE4.DESCRIPTION AS UNDERWRITINGCASERISKCLASS FROM ROLEINCASE LEFT JOIN UNDERWRITINGCASE UNDERWRITINGCASE1 ON UNDERWRITINGCASE1.UNDERWRITINGCASEID = ROLEINCASE.UNDERWRITINGCASEID LEFT JOIN TRANSUNDERWRITINGCASESTYPE TRANSUNDERWRITINGCASESTYPE2 ON TRANSUNDERWRITINGCASESTYPE2.UNDERWRITINGCASESTATUS = UNDERWRITINGCASE1.STATUS AND TRANSUNDERWRITINGCASESTYPE2.LANGUAGEID = #LANGUAGEID# LEFT JOIN TRANSDECISIONTYPE TRANSDECISIONTYPE3 ON TRANSDECISIONTYPE3.DECISION = UNDERWRITINGCASE1.DECISION AND TRANSDECISIONTYPE3.LANGUAGEID = #LANGUAGEID# LEFT JOIN TRANSRISKCLASSTYPE TRANSRISKCLASSTYPE4 ON TRANSRISKCLASSTYPE4.RISKCLASS = UNDERWRITINGCASE1.RISKCLASSIFICATION AND TRANSRISKCLASSTYPE4.LANGUAGEID = #LANGUAGEID# WHERE UNDERWRITINGCASE1.STATUS = 3 AND NOT UNDERWRITINGCASE1.POLICYID IS NULL AND ROLEINCASE.CLIENTID = '{SCLIENT}' ORDER BY ROLEINCASE.UNDERWRITINGCASEID, ROLEINCASE.ROLE, ROLEINCASE.CLIENTID
QueryStatements.RetrieveByKey: SELECT DISTINCT ROLEINCASE.ROWID AS RECORDID, ROLEINCASE.UNDERWRITINGCASEID,ROLEINCASE.ROLE,ROLEINCASE.CLIENTID, ROLEINCASE.UNDERWRITINGCASEID, ROLEINCASE.CLIENTID, UNDERWRITINGCASE1.UNDERWRITINGCASEID AS UNDERWRITINGCASEUNDERWRIT, UNDERWRITINGCASE1.OPENDATE AS UNDERWRITINGCASEOPENDATE, UNDERWRITINGCASE1.CLOSEDATE AS UNDERWRITINGCASECLOSEDATE, TRANSUNDERWRITINGCASESTYPE2.DESCRIPTION AS UNDERWRITINGCASESTATUSDES, TRANSDECISIONTYPE3.DESCRIPTION AS UNDERWRITINGCASEDECISIOND, TRANSRISKCLASSTYPE4.DESCRIPTION AS UNDERWRITINGCASERISKCLASS FROM ROLEINCASE LEFT JOIN UNDERWRITINGCASE UNDERWRITINGCASE1 ON UNDERWRITINGCASE1.UNDERWRITINGCASEID = ROLEINCASE.UNDERWRITINGCASEID LEFT JOIN TRANSUNDERWRITINGCASESTYPE TRANSUNDERWRITINGCASESTYPE2 ON TRANSUNDERWRITINGCASESTYPE2.UNDERWRITINGCASESTATUS = UNDERWRITINGCASE1.STATUS AND TRANSUNDERWRITINGCASESTYPE2.LANGUAGEID = #LANGUAGEID# LEFT JOIN TRANSDECISIONTYPE TRANSDECISIONTYPE3 ON TRANSDECISIONTYPE3.DECISION = UNDERWRITINGCASE1.DECISION AND TRANSDECISIONTYPE3.LANGUAGEID = #LANGUAGEID# LEFT JOIN TRANSRISKCLASSTYPE TRANSRISKCLASSTYPE4 ON TRANSRISKCLASSTYPE4.RISKCLASS = UNDERWRITINGCASE1.RISKCLASSIFICATION AND TRANSRISKCLASSTYPE4.LANGUAGEID = #LANGUAGEID# WHERE ROLEINCASE.UNDERWRITINGCASEID = {UNDERWRITINGCASEID} AND ROLEINCASE.ROLE = {ROLE} AND ROLEINCASE.CLIENTID = '{CLIENTID}' AND ROLEINCASE.CLIENTID = '{SCLIENT}'
QueryStatements.IsExist: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) FROM ROLEINCASE LEFT JOIN UNDERWRITINGCASE UNDERWRITINGCASE1 ON UNDERWRITINGCASE1.UNDERWRITINGCASEID = ROLEINCASE.UNDERWRITINGCASEID WHERE UNDERWRITINGCASE1.STATUS = 3 AND NOT UNDERWRITINGCASE1.POLICYID IS NULL AND ROLEINCASE.CLIENTID = '{SCLIENT}'

ToolTip.Value: Date the subscription case was created.
Fecha en que fue creado el caso de suscripción.
Date the subscription case was closed.
Fecha del cierre del caso de suscripción.
Decisión tomada depues de evaluar el caso de suscripción.

Remark.Value: Persons or companies related to underwriting case.
Personas o empresas relacionadas con este caso.
